title: TFT: Reach Level 6 by the second Shared draft (round 11)
body:
Hey Community people,

I'm playing TFT and trying the challenges out and the title above is buggy and also somewhat incorrect.

By the description of the challenge the second shared **DRAFT** (draft being the key word) would be round 16 not round 11 and round 11 is the round just after the second carousel or first shared **DRAFT**.

Beyond this,  if we go by the understanding that it is the third carousel (the first being the start of the game) then I have completed this challenge multiple times, if its not and it is indeed the second carousel or round 10 then it's actually impossible without immense luck using the pirates, of which getting gangplank (a 5% chance according to people on reddit) in round 4 (a 20% chance based on my view) requires you to get two 4 gold chests and sell all your champs.

Is anyone looking into this, because what the {{summoner:4}} RITO?

replies.body: yeah its the pirate luck one, no response from riot, so ff those beta rewards
